gw.api.community

Interface PublicUserUtil


  • public interface PublicUserUtil
    Provides basic utility methods for retrieving current user and its related objects.

    Access via User.util.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.guidewire.commons.metadata.i18n.config.GWLanguage getCurrentLanguage()
      Get the current user's language.
      com.guidewire.commons.metadata.i18n.config.GWLocale getCurrentLocale()
      Get the current user's locale.
      User getCurrentUser()
      Get the current user.
      User getUnrestrictedUser()
      Return the currently configured "unrestricted" user
      java.util.List getUsersInCurrentUsersGroup()
      Get a list of all users in the current user's group.
